JobFullDesc: “Microsoft Teams is on its way to becoming a digital platform as significant as the internet browser, or a computer operating system. It is the new “organizing layer”, pulling together all the tools a worker needs into a single place, as well as acting as a platform for other developers to deliver their own services. The result: collaboration tools, video meetings, chat and other business applications, all reached through a single user interface.” – Satya Nadella, Financial Times Jan 2021 Microsoft Teams is the fastest growing business application in Microsoft’s history getting to 145M daily active users in the first 4 years in the market. We provide THE communication and collaboration hub for teamwork and are on course to totally disrupt the team collaboration space. We are looking for a Group Engineering Manager who can operate in a fast-paced environment, build a high functioning team, provide strong strategic leadership, solution & design thinking, customer focus, and the ability to deliver results. As the engine room for Teams, the Engineering Systems organization consists of a savvy group of generalizing specialists; we blend years of software engineering expertise with some of the newest and most popular tools, frameworks and methodologies to empower an entire organization to build great software. We love open source; React, Typescript, grunt, gulp, yarn, selenium, node and .NetCore are part of our everyday vocabulary, but we’re not dogmatic about technologies – the best tool for the job is always the right tool. We pride ourselves in building systems and tools which make our fellow engineers more productive every day and enable them to ship high quality code to our customers continuously. We are looking for a Product leader with people management experience to make Teams Engineering Systems world class. You will lead a multi-GEO team of engineers focusing on building our engineering and deployment systems, working with engineers from across the Teams ecosystem, partners and customers to deliver
